reviewText: It was great, as expected. Arrived on time and unused, as I expected also. Way to take care of my baby! LOl
Title: Naruto Shippuden: Set Nine

reviewText: This is a tremendous box set! The action and story are great and the characters are some of my favorites...Kakashi, Shino, Hinata, Lee,TenTen etc. Guren is an interesting character also. I have every Naruto box set...and this one is one of the best if you like Naruto anime. I also read the manga and love it. This "filler" is just as good as anything I have seen from canon. Buy it on Amazon if you like Naruto!
Title: Naruto Shippuden: Set Nine

reviewText: Since this set finally reached an affordable amount I decided to buy it and set 8. I must say that for a filler arc it was enjoyable.Plus it arrived in good time and in excellent condition. It was well worth the money.
Title: Naruto Shippuden: Set Nine

reviewText: While I said a while back I was probably not going to continue purchasing Naruto Sets but for the sales price and the lingering fan feelings I decided to get a few new sets.  This set is basically the second part of the Gurren/3Tails story arc so if you don't care for filler episodes don't bother with either the this or the eighth box set as that's are they are.  The filler episodes will reunite a few of the leaf ninja twelve primarily Rock Lee/Tenten/Kiba/Shino/Hinata/Ino with help from Yamato and Shizune as well as Kakashi.  The episodes try to show us Naruto's own feelings of his village as he tries to help a young boy find his own way with mixed results. For those who are waiting for the story episodes instead the next set will have the Sasuke/Orichimaru arc so no worries about having to wait for that,  like usual the extras are pretty standard just trailers and some advertisements but nothing to shout about.  For what the sets are going for right now it's still reasonable to continue purchasing them even for lackluster fans of the series like me just don't start paying if they make the set prices $50.00 dollars then you will be getting ripped off...
summary: Can't Say If The Set Is Really Worth It But Does Give You The Finale Of This Filler Arc
Title: Naruto Shippuden: Set Nine

reviewText: With Naruto box sets costing as much as they do for as few episodes as you get, forgo buying this filler arc.  Rent it first or watch it online THEN make up your mind as to whether or not you want to buy it.  In my opinion, this arc is not necessary and not as good as the main story line.  Sure, it is hands down the best filler arc to date for the series (in my opinion) and they even throw in some funny stuff regarding Tobi and Deidara.  Plus the arc does neatly tie in to the real story line.  But ultimately, the main story stuff is very minimal and you will not miss anything by skipping this set.  I will never own this set... but I am so buying the next one!  Back to the main story line!!!
summary: Not worth your money... essentially 100% filler
Title: Naruto Shippuden: Set Nine

reviewText: Wanted to get as many episodes as possible that had been dubbed. This is a great addition to our collection.
Title: Naruto Shippuden: Set Nine
